history.proof: intros x n m. qsimpl time: 1.

original: intros x n m. induction n as [| n IH]. - simpl. rewrite mult_one_l. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- pow_n_plus. rewrite mult_assoc. rewrite IH. rewrite (mult_assoc (pow_n x m) x (pow_n x n)). apply f_equal2. * apply pow_n_comm_1. * reflexivity.
